### Tourism & Recreation

<br>
\[
\begin{aligned}
& x_{tr} \text{   is the status of  tourism and recreation goal}\\
\\
& x_{tr} = \frac{T_r}{T_{90th}}\\
\\
& T_r = E \times S \times W \\
\\
& E \text{   is the proportion of employees directly involved in the travel and tourim industry}\\
& S \text{   is the sustainability} (\text{ TTCI: Crotti \& Misrahi, } 2015)\\
& W \text{   is a penalty based on travel warnings issued by the US State Department}
\end{aligned}
\]
<br>
